tasks.title: Project Initiation
tasks.description: Initiate the project and set up necessary infrastructure
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Set up project repository
2. Set up development environment
3. Define project roles and responsibilities
4. Schedule project meetings
5. Assign tasks to team members

tasks.title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
tasks.description: Gather and analyze requirements for the calculator app
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Meet with stakeholders to gather requirements
2. Create user stories and use cases
3. Analyze requirements and prioritize features
4. Create requirement documentation
5. Review and finalize requirements with stakeholders

tasks.title: Android App Development
tasks.description: Develop the Calculator+ app for Android platform
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Set up Android development environment
2. Design app UI
3. Implement basic arithmetic operations
4. Implement scientific functions
5. Test and debug the app
6. Optimize app performance
7. Conduct user acceptance testing
8. Fix any reported issues
9. Finalize Android app

tasks.title: iOS App Development
tasks.description: Develop the Calculator+ app for iOS platform
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Set up iOS development environment
2. Design app UI
3. Implement basic arithmetic operations
4. Implement scientific functions
5. Test and debug the app
6. Optimize app performance
7. Conduct user acceptance testing
8. Fix any reported issues
9. Finalize iOS app

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Perform testing and quality assurance activities for both Android and iOS apps
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Develop test cases
2. Perform unit testing
3. Conduct integration testing
4. Perform user acceptance testing
5. Identify and report any issues
6. Collaborate with development team to fix issues
7. Retest fixed issues
8. Generate quality assurance reports

tasks.title: User Documentation
tasks.description: Create documentation and help files for the Calculator+ app
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Create user guides
2. Write help files
3. Document app features and functions
4. Review and finalize documentation
5. Prepare documentation for distribution

tasks.title: App Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy the Calculator+ app to app stores
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Prepare app for deployment
2. Submit app to Android app store
3. Submit app to iOS app store
4. Handle any required updates and revisions

tasks.title: Project Closure and Reporting
tasks.description: Conclude the project and create project closure report
tasks.detailedTask:
1. Review project deliverables
2. Close project contracts
3. Conduct project retrospective
4. Create project closure report
5. Present project closure report to stakeholders
